directions: Combine cabbage and rock salt together in a bowl. Let stand 15 minutes, stirring often. Rinse lightly and drain.
Mix cabbage, carrot, vinegar, vegetable oil, sugar, sesame oil, sesame seeds, cayenne pepper, and salt together in a bowl. Refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 small carrot, cut into thin strips
1 tablespoon white sugar, or to taste
1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
title: Quick and Easy Kimchi Salad
